title: BeliefISM: What Is Apatheism? Unapologetic 98
itunes:title: BeliefISM: What Is Apatheism? Unapologetic 98
description: Have you ever tried to share your faith with someone and they just don’t seem to care? They are apathetic about religion and faith altogether. On this episode, we unpack the beliefs of Apatheism and why it is so prominent today.
